website_summaries.verdict: Though it may take a couple of months to start seeing results, the product really lives up to its claims.
pros: After a few weeks, eyelashes appear fuller, longer and darker
cons: Causes redness and irritation for those with sensitive skin and eyes

customer_reviews.title: INCONSISTENT  PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product the first time and it worked wonderfully, the second time it did not work at all. Purchased it a third time from the Grande Lash MD website and it works great again. Do not purchase on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: tiffanie

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe Product
customer_reviews.text: Ladies, please save your money and do not buy this product. I have never had any problems buying skin care products in general bit with this, I am now going thru the worst side effects from using this item. I applied this every night before bedtime and after 4 weeks, my eyelids have developed an itchy rash. They are so sore, red and scabbing from the rubbing. It's so hard not to (rub or scratch) but I find myself doing it in my sleep! I am too embarassed but i feel i should post photos for proof. Please, please, please, save your money and yourself from the pain and irritability.
customer_reviews.author: SonjaA819

customer_reviews.title: Seems to thin lashes
customer_reviews.text: Last time I purchased this product I found it showed results right away. This time it seems like it is thinning my lashes and I’m wondering if I recieved a knock off product .
customer_reviews.author: Indy B

customer_reviews.title: Fake product
customer_reviews.text: Had allergic reaction to this product. I used in past but never bought on amazon. Don’t think this is the real product
customer_reviews.author: Amber crowder

customer_reviews.title: Don't waist your money!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for two weeks and have used it just as direct and now the tube is empy! $60 dollars down the drain. It says a 3 month's supply but obviously that isn't true. Don't waist your money!
customer_reviews.author: Carlene

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this stuff! It really works and I highly recommend it. I just ordered another 3 month supply. I noticed a difference after about one month of using. My lashes are longer and fuller. Absolutely love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. C

customer_reviews.title: Non-accomadating
customer_reviews.text: Made my eyes itch. My eyelids also became very dry. I had an allergic reaction to it. I gave it to my daughter, she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Denise C.

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing, slight lid discoloration
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than R&F, and works great so far! These are my results after 3 months. My only complaint is my lids have turned purplish where I apply the product. Not a big deal for me it looks like maroon eyeliner but I’m soo glad I didn’t put it under my eyes on my lower lashes!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: My friend said this works really well for her but it didn’t work at all for me.
customer_reviews.author: KP832

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely works.
customer_reviews.text: I really wish I would have taken "before" pics. My hairdresser told me about this stuff and said "it works so good I had to stop using it every night." I thought to myself "Oh yeah, lashes too long, no such thing" but I on my second tube and I'm going to start using every other night. My lashes are so long, and it's like I have a double row of lashes. My bottom lashes are thicker too. I rarely write reviews but wanted to share because it really really works.
customer_reviews.author: Asc

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using this product for over a year...I LOVE IT!! My lashes are so long and have become darker...when I wear this with my good mascara, people always ask if I have falsies on-and I'm a blonde!!! Highly recommend, especially for us gals over 40 who need some thickness and length to our lashes...
customer_reviews.author: victoria hoff

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is more than twice as much
customer_reviews.text: It’s great but I paid 65 on amazon for 2!!! Millimeters google it. It’s 31 on Walmart and 61 for double size of 4 millimeters
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: I now have long, beautiful eyelashes!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Grande cosmetics Grande Cosmetics GrandeLASH-MD - 3 Month Supply, for about thirteen weeks. The results are amazing. I have noticed a significant change in the thickness and especially the length of my eyelashes. My husband and daughters have complimented me on my long thick eyelashes. Even casual observers comment about my long, beautiful eyelashes. This has never happened until I began using this product. I am very happy and fully satisfied. I highly recommend its use. Thank you GrandelSASH-MD for this marvelous product!
customer_reviews.author: jlbayles

customer_reviews.title: This product REALLY works!
customer_reviews.text: I had extensions and took them off and had nothing left. After 2 weeks of applying every night before bed, my lashes actually grew and got thicker and are now getting longer after only 6 weeks. It does work if you're consistent. My friends lashes are super long (too long for my taste) but it confirms this product works well. Read the directions and if you put too much on and it drips into your eye it stings a little but I haven't had any issues beyond that.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Jo Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Terrible reaction
customer_reviews.text: There was not a lot of product in the tube for a hefty $65 dollar price. I have very sensitive skin, however I have used many lash serums with no issues. This serum however left a purple rash line at the application line. I tried to use it for three days to see if it was just a fluke reaction, but by the third day my entire eye lid was red and swollen.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this stuff after a recommendation from a friend. I have used Latisse and Rodan & Fields. This stuff is nothing like those products, even though it claims to be. It is cheaper so I thought maybe I would get the same results and be able to save some money. I was extremely disappointed and should have gone ahead and spent more to get the real deal. Don't be fooled by feedback from people saying it works. I gave up after a few months because I knew it was a waste of time. I will have to either order more R & F from my friend or get more Latisse if I want my lashes to grow.
customer_reviews.author: T. Couch

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Got this for Christmas. It’s Feb so about two months of using this at night, my lashes are getting redic! I put mascara on for the first time in weeks and they touch my eyebrows and project so much farther than before. Will buy again. Worth the $
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: It REALLY works.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for almost 3 month now. I have to say, my lashes have grown substantially. I was getting lash extensions for the past 6 years and finally had them taken off. My lashes were extremely short due to the extensions and I can tell my lashes have grown. I know it works differently for everyone so I have to say for myself, it has helped my lashes grown in length however not in thickness. Picture attached shows my lashes when I removed my lash extension(1) my lashes 2 months out with mascara(2) and last picture is today (3).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New formula?
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for years and have always been extremely satisfied with it. However, I don't know if they recently changed their formula because after the first night of using my new bottle I woke up like this. Maybe it was just a fluke and I got a defective product, but judging by the most recent reviews for it seems like they have changed something up for the worst. It's extremely disappointing because this used to be one of my favorite products.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write about anything even if I like it. But, I am amazed by this product. I had read all the reviews good and bad and was skeptical. But a friend recommended it and her lashes are amazing. So I tried it. In the beginning i did not use every day. But in the last 2 months I did and the results are amazing. My lashes are longer and thicker even without mascara. I Love what it has done to my lashes. This can sting the eye if it get into it but otherwise no irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Read this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews about products because most are exceptional from Amazon. This product however ever disappointed me & so I write. So many things women buy but do not meet the advertised expectations & I frequently chalk it up to "buyer beware". This one I am extremely disappointed with. I purchased from my hair salon the first time& loved the product. Decided to try purchasing from Amazon (paid more for the convenience) but while it advertised 3 months usage it was all dried up when I received. Do not chance spending $65.00 dollars on this from here, ask a trusted local salon if they can find for you... very much a waste of money that is dear to me.
customer_reviews.author: Lainey

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A FAKE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Seriously what a huge waste of money - when I opened the box that looked like it had been squished during shipping, the tube was oozing out of the plastic wrap and was all over the inside of the box and stuck to the attached paperwork, I opened it anyway. The tube doesn't seal and falls apart along with the fact that the brush is curved and not straight as shown. There was serum inside the casing of the tube, which fell apart when I attempted to take off the lid. Pictures are attached, what a total rip off!
customer_reviews.author: RedHead

customer_reviews.title: FAKE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Is anything on this site NOT a knock off anymore?? My lashes are THINNER. I am an esthetician and we used to sell this and it was amazing. This is garbage. Get it together, Amazon. Fake fake fake product.
customer_reviews.author: Little Harriet

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Really works!
customer_reviews.text: This product really works! It is so much cheaper than Rodan and Fields. I use the product in the morning and the afternoon. I have seen a huge difference in my lashes and have been receiving many compliments! I just received my second tube and can't wait to use again!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M.

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff actually works! I was skeptical for sure. My friend recommended it because her esthetician recommended it. After a few weeks, I noticed a big difference! Figured I would write a review since I ultimately made my decision based on the reviews. **Tip: if you're considering getting the eyebrow version of this stuff, apparently the formula is the exact same...you just get a different application brush. So I just use it on my brows instead of having to purchase both!
customer_reviews.author: cmac18

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have lashes without having to pay to have ...
customer_reviews.text: I find that if I am not careful putting this one that my eyes burn a little. I use it at night. I have found though that my eye lashes appear healthier and longer. If I use a curler..I don't need mascara! Nice to have lashes without having to pay to have them glued on!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: It caused eyelid redness and inflammation.
customer_reviews.text: This product was terrible for me. I woke up after using it the night before with swollen eyelids that were red and inflamed. I’ve never had a reaction to an eye product like that before. The redness and swelling didn’t go away for several days. I do not any sensitivities to other products and threw this out.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Harmful! Do you want blisters on your lash line?
customer_reviews.text: As a Nurse Practitioner I feel a STRONG obligation to show the results of ONE APPLICATION! I do not have sensitive skin and have used Latisse in the past with ZERO issues. This product BURNS, ITCHES and cause pustule formation within 24 hours of ONE APPLICATION! I CAUTION consumers and Amazon that this product is dangerous. Do NOT waste your money, just buy Latisse. Shame on Grandelash MD, do not be duped, this does not compare to Latisse. Wow. My eyes are still miserable and ache, and the lash line feels like it’s on fire. Grossly disappointing, I hope this prevents someone from getting hurt like me.
customer_reviews.author: R.C.

customer_reviews.title: Caused red eye inflammation
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if this product from this seller is authentic based on other reviews. It caused my eyes to appear red and irritated. I stopped use and my eyes were normal and white again. I restarted after one week and again it caused my eyes to appear red. There was no physical discomfort, but my eyes looked terrible and sick. I am not allergic to anything. I have used other eyelash treatments and nothing has ever made the whites of my eyes red. This was a rather expensive mistake!!
customer_reviews.author: CR, Sugar Land, TX

customer_reviews.title: ... helping and there brow color really helps it looks like I have brows where I had hardly any
customer_reviews.text: its a growth serum I apply in the morning and at night as I don't really have hardly any eyebrows on one side so thanks to there product its helping and there brow color really helps it looks like I have brows where I had hardly any .
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Youngblood

customer_reviews.title: Beware!
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work like the one I get at the beauty supply. It burned my daughter’s and my eyes, made them red, swollen, itchy. My daughter’s eye are still red. Mine took quite a few days to clear up. I want people to be aware of this so they don’t have this problem. If sold by a cosmetologist like myself it is a super product. Only buying from a beauty supply from now on.
customer_reviews.author: julie catalano

customer_reviews.title: This works
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used RevitaLaah before and was pretty disappointed so I had low expectations for this product but I was beyond impressed. With consistency and persistency this product will work. Forget about it and don’t expect anything for about the first month. Definitely take photos and compare it about two months later and you will see a significant different in length and volume. Naturally blessed with short Asian lashes and this product definitely helped grow it a bit. It’s certainly no lash extension but it does it’s job. Will continue to purchase on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: J Park

customer_reviews.title: That it does what it says it will do!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a very long time. My lashes were amazing. Long and full. The last order that I placed in September, I expected the same wonderful results. Not so. My lashes have thinned considerably and are much shorter, it's as if it is another product entirely. There is also a great deal of the serum on the wand of the brush. When I go to my order to review it, it is unavailable. It looks very suspicious. Most certainly not the same product. I want a refund and an explanation please. Sincerely, Ilsa Tweten
customer_reviews.author: ilsa tweten

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me, & caused discoloration, skin irritation and light sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me in any noticeable way after 37 days of consecutive, nightly use. Applied to the eyelid above my lashes, and on lower lids as the pictures and instructions show. It caused discoloration around my eyes, and irritated the skin on my eyelids which felt bad constantly. Started to notice light sensitivity too. I'm glad to stop using it. Looking forward to my eyes feeling good again. Found out the study (there was only 1) for this product was skimpy and poorly designed. That's sus to me. UPDATE: has been a few weeks since not using and eyes are still discolored, and sensitive. Sensitivity is gradually getting better though. I hope the discoloration goes away.
customer_reviews.author: jennemeg

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It works (takes about 2-3 months) and all of the girls in my family love, love LOVE Grande lash and Brow! I tried it first to review for a blog post and have been buying it ever since!
customer_reviews.author: Tasalinas

customer_reviews.title: Buy directly from the company
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product directly from the company (Grande Cosmetics) and the product worked great. I bought it from amazon and the product did not work at all. The Tube that the enhancer came in was also different. If you want to purchase this product, buy it directly from the company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: wow, this worked. I had my doubts. Took a month to notice effects. Now 5 months later I'm on the same tube and use it every night or sometimes every other night. My lashes often hit my sunglasses. I'll keep using it...love it! I love that it's lasting far longer than what they said. I bought it first on one of those big amazon july sales for around $37 and will keep an eye out for more sales in the future. I've seen it at walmart for the sale price too
customer_reviews.author: rachael

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit pricey but definitely is has made a difference and I will be buying a second one and because this worked so well I will consider trying the eyebrow one as well. I had false lashes for a holiday and once they fell out I had empty spots on my lashes, now they are fully gone since I’ve been using this serum consistently.
customer_reviews.author: Martina Edge

customer_reviews.title: Miracle serum. Worth every penny. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried 2 other lash serums with no luck. I got this hoping that third time would be the charm and HOORAY!!! This one really works. Pics are before after 8 weeks and after 12 weeks with mascara. I didn't have enough lashes to wear mascara for years. This is a miracle. I actually have my lashes touching my glasses they are so long now. I am recommending this to everyone I know. I keep whipping out my phone to show friend the before pics. Without mascara my new lashes are coming on black and a coworker thought I just started wearing makeup when all I was wearing was my new grown in lashes. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: D. Donadio

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in February and love it! I had tried latisse a few years ago and i didn’t see much of a difference, I had used it for about 6 months, but with this I saw a difference in 3-4 weeks with daily usage. My lashes are long and full. I’ve also started putting it on my brows and see growth too. The results are with only 1 bottle, putting it on every night. Gonna by my second one in probably 2 weeks. Every once in awhile my eyes sting but doesn’t last and not bothersome to me and still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Rose A

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY !!  THE TUBE WAS  EMPTY!!
customer_reviews.text: 6/15/20 THE VALUE FOR THE MONEY SPENT IS NOT WORTH IT!! HAVING DONE MY RESEARCH AND READING ALL OF THE REVIEWS, I WAS EXCITED TO USE THIS PRODUCT. HOWEVER ALL OF THAT EXCITEMENT LASTED AS LONG AS THE ACTUAL PRODUCT DID!! I RECEIVED THIS PRODUCT ON 6/6/20 AND I HAVE USED IT AS DIRECTED A GRAND TOTAL OF 4 TIMES AND THE TUBE IS COMPLETELY EMPTY!! THE TUBE HAS BEEN KEPT STANDING UP SO ITS NOT POSSIBLE THAT THE PRODUCT IS STUCK TO THE SIDES OF THE TUBE. WHAT A WASTE OF MY HARD EARNED DOLLARS!! 😡😡😡
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: No difference
customer_reviews.text: I am ever the optimist when it comes to purchasing lash products after reading positive reviews. After all... who would not love to experience the same thick lush lashes that other reviews encountered? Sadly this was not my experience. I took before photos and when I got to the end of the container I took additional photos to double check the results. Needless to say... this product did not work for me. I usually give two stars for products that don’t work for me but worked for others but I think it is time that I use the one star option just so folks can read that this product does not work for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Tugman

customer_reviews.title: BARELY A MONTH'S SUPPLY OF SERUM!
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was less than a whole star to rate GrandeLash! Although this product is easy to use, even following the directions and applying one swipe to each eyelash at night, it LASTED BARELY A MONTH! Just as I was beginning to see some lash improvement, there is zero serum left in tube. Which by package design, you can't see how much was sold to you to begin with! $60 plus for approximately 30 days...no thanks! Definitely will not repurchase or recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Y. Earl Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Irritated my eyes
customer_reviews.text: I recommend starting with buying the lowest amount (six weeks supply). this product irritated my eyes and made them read from day one use, this disappeared when I stopped using it. I used it only for a couple of days and wasn’t able to assess it’s efficacy due to irritation. Given this high price I was very disappointed that I could not use it or get e refund after I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Empty serum bottle
customer_reviews.text: Got my product today that I was so exited to try and the bottle came empty without any product in it. So disappointing. And I can’t return it due to the policy.
customer_reviews.author: anna morgunova

customer_reviews.title: Only use for 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: I used it for 3 months. Saw a huge difference. Purchased it again and didn't see a different however... my lashes are still long. Id use it again if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer AK

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Didn't do anything except sting my eyes off and on, and I was careful about application. Total waste.
customer_reviews.author: mizh

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money, likely a knockoff
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely doesn't work. I've seen a lot of reviews telling me the amazon version is a knockoff and I'm wondering if that's the case right now. Everyone has told me how well it works but it legit hasn't done one thing for my lashes, which makes me think this isn't the real deal. Been using for months on end and eyelashes look identical. Yes, I put in on correctly and consistently, it's not that hard or complicated. Pissed because I think I got screwed out of $70. I spent hours deciding on the right product and obviously got duped. I'm just going to get a lash tint and lift as planned. This purchase was very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: I actually liked this product in the beginning and re ordered. Unfortunately, the second month of use, I have started losing my eyelashes. I dont know why, but I am blaming this product. I ve always had short lashes but never had an eyelash loss problem. I am very sad and upset. And I see so many people are happy with this product. Good for them. Unfortunately products dont give the same results to everybody.
customer_reviews.author: B. Burris

customer_reviews.title: Works great, if you dont mind dark circles
customer_reviews.text: I'm conflicted on this. It works fantastic! But every morning after I've applied it I have crazy dark circles for 2 days. I was talking to my dermatologist and she said I'm probably just more sensitive to it, it should only discolor around the lash line, but holy smokes! Hope you have a great concealer. Yikes. I stopped using it for awhile and my lashes are back to themselves, not long and lush so it doesnt take long to lose the lash length.
customer_reviews.author: eleasajane711

customer_reviews.title: I give it 4 stars because it does leave a small shadow like dark line right where I apply it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used GrandeLash-MD for about a year and a half and this stuff truly works! I’ve cut down to using it only once a day because my lashes will get almost too long with twice daily use. I give it 4 stars because it does leave a small shadow like dark line right where I apply it. I wear makeup almost everyday so it really doesn’t bother me too much. I also wish there was a bit more product in the tube. Even using mine once daily, it doesn’t last me 3 months. I’d say 2 is more accurate. Overall I am very happy with this product and will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: MyThoughts27

customer_reviews.title: Bad product no returns allowed so
customer_reviews.text: This is a horrible product - they won’t let me return it either it made my eyes heavy and red and it made me feel really sick - I don’t know what is wrong with this but be very very careful I am so upset I may never order from amazon again there is nothing that says it is not returnable but it isn’t
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Makes your skin red & irritated around your eyes!!!
customer_reviews.text: It somehow worked but made my eye skin red! I'm a man with very tolerant skin, can't imagine the irritation on women's skin!?! You may start to look like a raccoon on a bad day with red irritated skin around your eyes! Be aware!!!
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING and 100% works
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a couple of years and was buying from my hair stylist. I had very thin and sparse eyelashes and was considering fake. I started using this instead, it does take at least 2 months for it to start working and you need to put it on every day religiously, but it is totally worth the wait. I saw a huge difference and so did everyone else. I was being asked if I did extensions or fake lashes! You do have to continue it for life basically but you can go down to a couple of days a week once you have them established
customer_reviews.author: MolS

customer_reviews.title: This one works!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried Rodan and Fields and it really stung my eyes plus I found that I grew eyelashes but they fell out. This stuff is the real deal and for much less money! I have been using it for 3 months now and people compliment my eyelashes even when I am not wearing mascara. I plan to try their eyebrow product as well and hope it works this great! I know $60 is not cheap but it is worth it if it works. This is worth every cent! I love that you apply it once a day and it could not be easier just a swipe on the upper and lower eyelids and you're done!!
customer_reviews.author: Doggymcnuggets

customer_reviews.title: Sceptical that this is the real stuff
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this is the real product or not. I was using the same product which I bought at a local store and it worked well. My lashes were much longer than ever. As I started to run out, I thought I'd order from Amazon this time. This product is not working at all. I've watched my lashes get shorter and thinner over the past several weeks. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle A

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth it but it does take the full 4-6 weeks to start really showing a difference.
customer_reviews.author: CMD

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT the real stuff! I have a tube from the real website and it was almost gone when I bought this. This I've looks like the real stuff but it isn't. My eyelashes have started to fall out now. This does NOTHING! DO NOT BUY THIS GO TO ACTUAL REAL WEBSITE TO PURCHASE. VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.author: ShopAHoliC

customer_reviews.title: Eyelashes were beautifully longer.
customer_reviews.text: Noticeable longer after 3 months. Even my cousins from Europe noticed when I came there a year apart. They thought I applied false eyelashes until I told them that it was serum I started using from last time they saw me. They were surprised to see it worked so well. It seems I got the real deal bottle. I wish so badly I did before and after pics!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: I thought i loved this product but within the first month it left the area around my eyes bright red... I’m not sure what happened within that couple of months but I won’t buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Larissa Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Worst Product EVER
customer_reviews.text: If I could give negative stars, I totally would. This product is HORRIBLE. DO NOT BUY. I used this product for five weeks and had zero results. VERY unhappy considering I paid $65. There is another lash serum that has 27,000 reviews that I bought for like $23 and saw results after 10 days. I highly recommend Lavish Lash on Amazon. You will be sorry if you purchase this. Might as well throw your money in the trash or buy some lotto tickets instead!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B.

customer_reviews.title: This did absolutely nothing for my lashes
customer_reviews.text: I used this religiously for over 3 months and my lashes look exactly the same as they did prior to starting. It did nothing for me. Bummer! However ... I have a friend who is 70 and she uses it. She is the reason I bought it so maybe it's just different on different people? Or, maybe the 'batch' I got wasn't good? I'm going to try Rodan Fields. Heard a lot about that.
customer_reviews.author: Rubijulie

customer_reviews.title: Amazon will not refund your money
customer_reviews.text: This product irritated my eyes. Caused redness dryness and caused blurred vision. It lasted weeks. Amazon would not refund my money either. And I’m a prime member. Very unhappy
customer_reviews.author: Susan D.

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent Product Mailed Out EMPTY CONTAINER
customer_reviews.text: Super excited to get my item- Ive used before and it works if you are consistent. However there appears to be nothing in the tube! I stuck the wand in/out several times to get a near dry wand. Pretty annoyed as this is not a cheap product. I am well aware the product comes in a small dose vs packaging, but this is ridiculous. Not sure what went wrong, why I got a tube that appears to be empty
customer_reviews.author: lisanne m.

customer_reviews.title: Be patient
customer_reviews.text: Be patient. I started in May after I had my baby. (Since you cant use while pregnant) I didn’t see results myself until like 6 weeks. And that’s forgetting a night or two along the way. Now I can tell especially when putting on mascara. I will continue to use hoping to have better results. The only reason I took a star away is the time it took to notice but it truly works.
customer_reviews.author: starrlite

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big Amazon customer, but they blew it on this one. I used an incredibly effective lash serum, MD Lash Factor. When I needed to reorder I searched for it but got hooked by "Amazon's Choice" for half the price. It doesn't work, I've applied several times daily for 6 weeks with no change, so basically I threw money away by listening to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Geraghty

customer_reviews.title: NO EXCHANGE - NO REFUND - NO CREDT FOR DRIED UP PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I bought two tubes on Amazon on March 22, 2020. One was fine the other complete dried up not a drop in it! The company won't allow me to return it or exchange or get a refund. $65 down the drain. I am not happy. Update: I participated in an Amazon chat regarding my frustration about not being to exchange, return or refund because the product was defective. The Amazon representative was able to help me get an Amazon credit. Thank you Amazon. I will continue to buy the product. It is a good product and it works but I will buy it from Ulta or Sephoria because they take back defective products with no hassle.
customer_reviews.author: spierce

customer_reviews.title: Not the same product as before...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second tube. First off, the tube feels way cheaper. And the most awesome part, there was NO liquid in the tube. Zero. No moisture at all. Im not sure if I got a really bad knock off or what's up. But I'm super disappointed because the first tube I got was awesome. I won't buy through here again.
customer_reviews.author: SaraK

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work at all
customer_reviews.text: I had used a different lash serum with great success but it was more expensive. I looked and GrandeLash had good reviews online, so I ordered it in September. It didn’t seem to be working but I decided to give it until Christmas. It did not work at all for me. I lost most of my lashes and went right back to where I had been before using any lash serum, with stubby and missing lashes. I’ve switched back to RevitaLash, and hope my lashes can recover. I cannot in good conscience recommend GrandeLash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than fake eyelashes!!!
customer_reviews.text: After wearing false eyelashes for over 20 years, I had to temporarily give them up for LASIK surgery. I was fearful because false (and extensions) had regularly pulled my eyelashes out. After surgery and when it was safe to do so, I decided to give up false eyelashes entirely and try Grande Lash. I was tired of the fake looking eyelashes on me and everyone else...even the “natural looking” eyelash extensions still look fake to me. Well, this absolutely works. I like how my eyes look natural and ARE really my own beautiful lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy I. Smith

customer_reviews.title: They wand is a nightmare!
customer_reviews.text: The wand on this thing is a nightmare... Impossible to use so that getting it all over your face.. It looks like a huge brush.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit product. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy from Amazon. This product made my eyes itchy. When I tried the one directly from the company, my eyes are fine. So this item on amazon is counterfeit. I bought 2 and I would like my money back. Ladies, it's the same price on their website so do yourself a favor and purchase from the company rather than on amazon. I purchased it here for convenience but look what happened.
customer_reviews.author: Yumi Y.

customer_reviews.title: Made my eyes so red and puffy I hate it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve heard good reviews on this product so I decided to buy it. First time I used it and it made my eyes sting so bad but thought it was just the product “working”. When I woke up in the morning I woke up to red puffy eyes and they were scabbing like if I was scratching them for hours! My eyes were so red it looked as if I had popped a blood vessel!. And no I am not exaggerating. Maybe it works for some people but for me it’s a total loss of $70. Now I’m stuck with a product I can’t use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend their lash and brow products
customer_reviews.text: It really works. My eye lashes have grown and curl up beautifully. I received so many compliments. So happy with the product, I recommend it. My lashes used to fallout all the time and were so flimsy. Now, they’re growing and are healthy, not falling off even when gently pulling on them. There is a slight after burn when rubbing my eyes but it goes away after a second. I absolutely love this product and also love and use their grande brow product
customer_reviews.author: vasi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I never leave reviews, but this shit is amazing, no joke! And I never believe other people when they say the same thing about leaving reviews...I already had naturally long lashes, but this serum made them explode like crazy! It took around 2 months to see full results, but I could literally start seeing a difference after 2 weeks. And I didn't even realize how long they actually got until I applied mascara. The picture to the right is my before. I started using this product towards the end of April. The collage picture to the left was just taken a couple days ago. You can see how long they look with, and without mascara!
customer_reviews.author: Tm555

customer_reviews.title: Empty/Dried-Up from Day 1!
customer_reviews.text: I tried to order this to save much-needed money vs. using Rodin and Fields Lash Boost during the worst economic depression since the Great Depression. Frustratingly, it was a waste if money because the tube was nearly empty/dry when I first opened it after running out of Lash Boost. This is a scam, just an empty bottle. Very upsetting
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: 60 with lashes
customer_reviews.text: This product really works to grow longer lashes. I am a sixty year old woman who has never had long lashes. My hairdresser turned me on to this product, she had been using it and I saw her results. The only reaction I have had is my eyelid skin color has darkened, but no rash like some of the unfortunate reviews. I tried the 'other' lash grow serum sold on Amazon because of its price...don't waste your time or money (it did NOTHING!) I will continue to use Grande Lash MD because it works. P.S. I save money on mascara now too, never more than one coat needed now!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Feigle

customer_reviews.title: This stuff REALLY works!
customer_reviews.text: Totally satisfied with this product and how well it has worked for me. My lashes were thinning and half as long as they used to be. After using this product for 3 months, I couldn't believe how long my lashes have become and they have filled in too, even though I was cautioned that thickness was not guaranteed. My second purchase was made through Amazon. One tube of this lasts approximately 6 months and you really see results after 6 weeks - I did. After reaching your length goal, use every other day. I'm very happy. Now, I actually have eyelashes again (at age 57 and with thyroid disease).
customer_reviews.author: T. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Caused irritation/ Can't return
customer_reviews.text: All around my eyes became red and looked like I had a rash when I used it. Tried to return it, but it wasn't allowed.... Wasted $65.
customer_reviews.author: ZoeZelda

customer_reviews.title: Wow wow wow ! Must try !
customer_reviews.text: This really works ! Noticed at around 3 weeks they were longer. I’m on almost 3 months and now they are fuller and longer. Shown are 2 before and the last 2 taken today. I do have mascara bcs I like black lashes but honestly before they were never this long. I’ve been asked if they are falsies. I am hooked. I only used ever other day now.
customer_reviews.author: Monika_rn

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price ! Real results !
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but I have to say, this product actually works. I’ve been using for 4 weeks, and my lashes are much fuller and longer. A friend recommended this product after experiencing the same great results. It’s expensive but by the time you purchase 3 or 4 other, cheaper products And don’t see results , you will realize that this is actually worth the money. I experienced slight irritation for the first few days and did end up abandoning my retinol under eye cream bc my eye watering was washing it into my eye, and causing redness. After a few days the sensitivity went away completely and the results are pretty extraordinary.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Works and doesn't effect lash extensions
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't classify this as a "miracle" product but it does seem to work! I get eyelash extensions regularly and despite going to a great lash tech, extensions will damage your real lashes (because of the weight etc.) My lash tech told me about one month after regular use that I had more lashes and they were growing out faster. It doesn't seem to bother my extensions (the glue isn't effected by its use). I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie C.

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff everrrrrrr
customer_reviews.text: I thought these reviews were fake but I was like what the hell I’ll buy it one time. Wow guys NOT KIDDING, this stuff WORKS! My lashes are barely there and I’ve been getting eyelash extensions for over a year, but my lashes have grown at least 3x their length and it only took 3 months. I used this during my night routine before bed and started seeing a difference around 6-8 weeks. I still use it and just added Jamaican black castor oil too to give it a boost! Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Hines

customer_reviews.title: lawsuit waiting to happen
customer_reviews.text: I've never used a product for lashes that created so many issues. My eyes turned bloodshot and no allergy eyedrops worked. I had red bumps around my eyes that were stinging and itchy. By the time you appy the serum, even if you try to wash it out, the damage has been done. At first, I wasn't sure the serum was what caused my eye issues so silly me, I applied a little on one eye just to make sure the serum was the culprit. It took less than a minute for my eyes to sting, itch etc. For $65 no less. Save your eyes, save you $$$!
customer_reviews.author: moodaa

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: I just got this in July. The last one I bought was six months before this. I used this product for three weeks and it is one dry!!! Once a day for three weeks and there is nothing left!!! The last one I had lasted several months. This Is ar rip off!
customer_reviews.author: Sally A. Herman

customer_reviews.title: Long, gorgeous lashes in a couple months!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you want long, beautiful lashes or want to keep your lashes from falling out, this is the product for you!!!! I lost all my lashes during a medical treatment and was devastated. I started using GrandLash and within a month my long lashes were coming back. They now look so great, everywhere I go people ask me about them, if they’re real which they are, and how did I get them. I tell them about GrandLash and get countless thank you notes for doing so months later. This is one of the rare products that does exactly what it promises and then some! Buy it, but it, BUY IT!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Pink eye
customer_reviews.text: This product gave me a pink eye after using it. Contacted Amazon who referred me to vendor. Vendor never replied and when I made a review it was not published becasue I told the truth that it gave me a pink eye.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!! Was very skeptical even after reading the reviews but I’m blown away by this stuff. I’m in my sixties and didn’t think anything would make my lashes grow. I was very faithful applying this every night and wow. My lashes are long and full. So glad I tried this before spending twice as much on the “other”.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Can cause some allergic reaction but works
customer_reviews.text: Using for the first time Have allergic reaction ( redness and dryness) A little disappointing and upset of the reaction :/ Update: good news :) I gave myself the second chance. So I tried very small amount of serum. I feel some little burning, BUT ... using for a few weeks I can see it works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonia

customer_reviews.title: Caused irritation and itching
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product 1 star because unfortunately it caused major sensitivity for my eyelids. The were red, burning , and itchy. I bought the product because my girlfriend used it with great success and never experienced the sensitivity. Her lashes looked amazing .
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon Royles

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe it actually works
customer_reviews.text: I had no faith in what I thought was just another snake oil pitch. My lashes had seemingly disappeared over the years, even though I rarely use mascara. My sister recommended this. She never had lashes, and she now has fans! I bought the product and didn't even use it consistently... maybe 6 times over the last 6 months. OMG!!! Now, when I put on mascara, my lashes are NOTICEABLY longer! They hit my glasses!!!!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!
customer_reviews.author: EMCM

customer_reviews.title: Destroyed my eyes, I was diagnosed with Uveitis after using this product
customer_reviews.text: My eye has been blood shot and extremely painful For 5 days because of this product! Do not buy this save your money! Update: my eye became sensitive to light and I began to get horrible headaches. I finally convinced an eye doctor to see me( this all happened during the covid-19 shelter in place order) this product gave me uveitis and I have to treat with 2 weeks of steroid drops! Skip buying this and save your eyes
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Rheaume

customer_reviews.title: Makes your eyes red and itchy
customer_reviews.text: This is a horrible buy. It made my lashes fall out and my eyes itch all the time. My doctor says no one should use this. They also won’t let me return it. This is why I’m writing this review.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Knock off?
customer_reviews.text: I have used the “real” grandelash for years with great results. This is obviously a knock off of the real deal. This bottle didn’t work at all.
customer_reviews.author: CynDee

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: This definitely works!! I used to use Lashboost, which worked but was over 2x the price. Honestly, my results haven't been as completely consistent as they were with the other product (a few lashes in the corners of my eyes are shorter than the others) but this product really has done a great job. I wish I had pictures, but suffice it to say my natural eyelashes cannot reach my lids, but after using this product and curling my eyelashes I feel them brushing against the skin under my eyebrows all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Mama

customer_reviews.title: Be weary of this product
customer_reviews.text: I used this religiously during quarantine. My lashes were full, long and looked great. I stopped using it consistently and my lashes began to break off. I stopped using the serum completely and that's when I really noticed the negative results. They are just now getting back to normal. Save your lashes and money!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa H.

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not the one using it since it is my wife the one who bought it, but the reason that I'm doing the review is because it REALLY WORKS!!! In just a few days I noticed that my wife had longer eyelashes, and it was always her complaint not to have too long eyelashes. Well, this product made the magic. They now look longer and after using the mascara they look even better. I don't know what is in it but they look now more "grande".
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: After a SINGLE application, I developed purple, raised allergic response in the exact area I applied this GrandeLash product. This product is improperly tested on human subjects, possibly produced in non-sterile environment and could conceivably cause visual loss. This ought to be reported and investigated, particularly that there are others who submitted similar adverse effects.
customer_reviews.author: lulemon

customer_reviews.title: Defective from this seller
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived to me defective without a brush to the wand to apply it. The seller is a scam because you cannot return this product either and you are gypped $65. Learn from my mistake and buy from a more reliable source.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Gaw

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK!!!! DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This product is a RIP off. I spent $70.00 and not only is it not enough to last 3 months, it doesnt work. Customer service will not respond even though it says that the product is guarenteed to work. Either it's fake or the product simply dont work. Dont believe the hype!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

product_meta.title: Grande Cosmetics GrandeLASH-MD Lash Enhancing Serum
product_meta.description:
Size:2 ml - 3 Month supplyAn award-winning lash enhancing serum infused with a blend of vitamins, peptides, and amino acids to promote the appearance of naturally longer, thicker looking lashes in 6 weeks, with full improvement in 3 months. It’s a favorite for helping to enhance short, thinning, brittle lashes. Ophthalmologist tested. Suitable for contacts and lash extensions. WARNING: Do not get into the eyes; in event of direct contact, rinse with cool water. Do not use if you are pregnant or nursing, under the age of 18, are prone to dry eyes or styes or undergoing chemotherapy. Keep out of reach of children. If you have sensitive skin, please perform a patch test before using product. If redness or irritation occurs, stop using product. Consult physician if you are being treated for an eye-related condition. Ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Panthenol, Glycerin, Sodium Citrate, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Alanine, Alcohol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Arctostaphylos Uva URSI Leaf Extract, Arginine, Aspartic Acid, Calcium Gluconate, Caprylyl Glycol, Chamomilla Recutita (Metricaria) Flower Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Gluconolactone, Glycine, Hexylene Glycol, Histidine, Honey Extract/Mel/Extrait de Miel, Hydrolyzed Glycosaminoglycans, Hydrolyzed Yeast Extract, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Isoleucine, Isopropyl Cloprostenate, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, PCA, Phenylalanine, Polysorbate 20, Proline, Propylene Glycol, Serine, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Lactate, Sodium PCA, Threonine, Tocopheryl Acetate, Triethanolamine, Tussilago Farfara (Coltsfoot) Leaf Extract, Valine, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Metabisulfite.

BRAND STORY
Enhance your own natural beauty with the Grande Collection! Our mission is for you to be able to enhance your own natural features, including your real lashes, lips, brows & hair with safe & effective formulas.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
